node.title: Teenager detonates bomb at Moscow school, injuring 12
node.alt: A police officer stands guard at the entrance of the Orthodox convent school after the bombing, December 13, 2021.
node.description: A graduate of an Orthodox School near Moscow detonates a homemade bomb inside the school injuring at least 12 people.
node.content:
["A teenager has allegedly detonated a homemade bomb at a school attached to an Orthodox convent near Moscow, wounding 12 people including a 15-year-old, Russian authorities say.", "The suspected bomber is an 18-year-old graduate of the school, who authorities say attempted to 'self-detonate' on the premises.\u00a0", "The alleged bomber survived the explosion and is currently in intensive care.", "The blast occurred in the Vladychny convent in Serpukhov, 105 kilometres outside of Moscow, Russian state news agency TASS reported.", "It also reported that the man\u00a0intended for the bomb to go off during morning prayers, but it detonated at the school entrance instead.", "", "
Experts work at the entrance to convent in Serpukhov.(AFP:\u00a0Dimitar Dilkoff)
", "Yuri Ivanov, a security guard at the school, said, \"A window was smashed, and a door was broken (due to the explosion). There was a prayer service going on.\"", "Media reports suggest that the man may have been motivated by hatred of the students, teachers and nuns.", "Staff and students have been evacuated from the scene and Russia's Investigative Committee has opened an investigation.", "AP"]
